item.title: Rust_learn
item.description: 1. Hello World 1.2 格式化输出 1.2.4 格式化 impl fmt::Display for Color { fn fmt(&self, f: &mut fmt::Formatter) -> fmt::Result { write!(f, "RGB (")?; write!(f, "{}, {}, {}) ", self.red, self.green, self.blue)?; write!(f, "0x{:02X}{:02X}{:02X}", self.red, self.green, self.blue) } } 2. 原生类型 2.2 元组 struct Matrix(f32, f32, f32, f32); impl fmt::Display for Matrix { fn fmt(&self, f: &mut fmt::Formatter) -> fmt::Result { write!(f, "( {} {} )\n", self.0, self.1)?; write!(f, "( {} {} )", self.
